titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, 5. 12. 1938
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original bei Timothy Moore; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (deutsch: Briefe, S. 211; Cambridge Letters, S. 303).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I shall arrange times with my students at 3 p.m on Wednesday Jan. 18th in Wisdoms room at Trinity.
I should like to see you again some time this week if you don't mind. Would Friday at 4 or 5 be all right?
